original_title: Recess Monkey: Tambourine Submarine Live at Teatro ZinZanni
overview: Seattle's Recess Monkey and Teatro ZinZanni present the high-flying spectacular: Tambourine Submarine LIVE! Filmed in 6-camera HD in front of a live audience on November 17, 2013, this show is a unique family-driven hybrid of Teatro ZinZanni's renowned circus productions and Recess Monkey's contagious dance party live show!
tagline: Will Percival and Matey find the treasure? Will Marina the Mermaid find her legs? Will the Sea Goddess ever remember to charge her cellphone? And will Recess Monkey remember to take a breath!?
title: Recess Monkey: Tambourine Submarine Live at Teatro ZinZanni
